pageContext.collection_description: Air checks, sports, news, political coverage, local DJs, local music, station IDs/jingles, and local commercials from stations WKBW, WBEN, WINE, WHSO, WEBR, and WGR, from 1950s-1980
pageContext.collection_notes: Cichon is a former WBEN announcer and local author who is working on a book with Marty Biniasz on Buffalo broadcasting history; full bio at http://www.buffalostories.com/steve.htm
